comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Mis-captioned. This is Hilaire Belloc (d. 1870 - d. 1953), as per Wikipedia, "Anglo-French writer and historian who became a naturalised British subject in 1902. He was one of the most prolific writers in England during the early twentieth century. He was known as a writer, orator, poet, satirist, man of letters and political activist." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hilaire_Belloc

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: TVL1970: Thanks for catching the mistake and for providing more information on Belloc. The caption information for the next negative in the Bain series, a photo of Lt. Fred Mears, was inadvertently swapped with this one. We will switch them back!
